com.DivineInspiration.experimenter.Activity.UI.Comments

Class CommentListAdapter.ViewHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder
      • com.DivineInspiration.experimenter.Activity.UI.Comments.CommentListAdapter.ViewHolder
  • Enclosing class:
    CommentListAdapter

    public static class CommentListAdapter.ViewHolder
extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder
    A custom RecyclerView.ViewHolder class. Displays comments as a card. Also contains a hidden RecyclerView of replies
